A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: About a quarter of the way into The Last Jedi\, I turned to my husband and said \"I've got a bad feeling about this.\"  Sigh\, I was right.  This movie stunk.  Old characters were neglected and new characters were awful.  The plot was boring and some of the cheesiest parts of any movie I've ever seen were in this movie.  It was as bad as the honest fans are saying it was.  The rest are either bought off or delusional.
